title: Papers, Please celebrates its 10th anniversary with a retro LCD demake, merch, and a big donation
description: Glory to Arstotzka and to the power of art.

title: Metro 2033 author Dmitry Glukhovsky sentenced to 8 years in prison for criticizing Russia's invasion of Ukraine
description: Glukhovsky was found guilty of posting social media messages accusing Russian soldiers of committing crimes in Ukraine.

description: It's actually way less evil than she makes it sound.

description: A surprise giveaway in Union Square last week turned ugly when thousands of people showed up.

title: Apple books exclusive access to TSMC's 3nm chipmaking capacity for a whole year
description: The deal also means that Apple only has to pay for working chips.

title: If you're playing Baldur's Gate 3 multiplayer, Larian's boss has advice on what to do with companions: ignore them
description: Whether singleplayer or multiplayer, you'll have the best time focusing on your party and ignoring the companions you don't have room for.

description: If at first you don't succeed, you're dead.

title: Bungie confirms Commander Zavala is staying in Destiny 2, with Keith David taking over the role from the late Lance Reddick
description: David, a well-known actor who has appeared in numerous games throughout his career, will step in for Lance Reddick, who died earlier this year.

title: Amazon joins Nvidia and Intel as it plans to spend billions on chip designer Arm once it goes public
